snippet: James Ward rallied from two sets down to beat John Isner in a Davis Cup match that lasted almost five hours in Glasgow, giving Britain a 2-0 lead over the United States.
abstract: James Ward defeats John Isner in Davis Cup tennis match, giving Britain 2-0 lead over United States; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: James Ward rallied from two sets down to beat John Isner in a Davis Cup match that lasted almost five hours in Glasgow, giving Britain a 2-0 lead over the United States.

headline.main: Britain Leads U.S. in Davis Cup
